name: Dr Livingstone, I Presume!
description: Dr Livingstone, I Presume is an exploration game that provides plenty of fun and excitement for players aged 6 to 12. The players must guide the hero (an explorer named Henry Stanley) through the wilderness of Africa in search of fellow explorer, Dr Livingstone. Needless to say, Stanley is faced with all sorts of challenges and dangers along the way, ranging from deadly snakes to crossing crocodile-infested rivers. The players will need to stay sharp if Stanley is going to make it. This a game that will keep young players coming back for more.
